sentences.en: Ahrl ( Ghul Harvest ): Can be used to find out a certain destructible a tree.
sentences.cn: 采集木材 ): 这个技能可以从可破坏物中把树挑出来.

sentences.en: At present are 2 - chloro ben - mode of destructible cover stealthily.
sentences.cn: 目前主要有2种形式可破坏显偷换盖.

sentences.en: Destructible rocks block the ideal building placement point at this expansion, however.
sentences.cn: 但是可毁岩块挡住了这个扩张区中安置建筑物的理想地点.

sentences.en: Engage in epic siege warfare to lay waste to destructible buildings in your path.
sentences.cn: 新增史诗攻城作战战场,在战场中有许多可供破坏的建筑物.

sentences.en: Excellent visual presentation with dozens of character animations, fully destructible environments and voice dubbing!
sentences.cn: 优秀的视觉效果与几十个字符动画, 完全破坏环境和语音配音!

sentences.en: I believe, men also are sometimes sentimental, not resilient , buried in the past, stingy, and destructible.
sentences.cn: 相信, 男人也会婆婆妈妈, 对感情拿不起放不下, 活在过去, 变得小气, 不堪一击.

sentences.en: The entire central command complex is still destructible, but there's a natural flow to it which means you can't just find a camping spot and snipe all the critical buildings with rockets.
sentences.cn: 整个的围墙复合体都是可以被破坏的，不过有一个设计是你并不能通过火箭筒来找到所有的暗哨和狙击手。

words.tran_cn: 破坏的；毁灭性的；有害的，消极的
破坏性；毁灭性；破坏能力

trans.tran_en: capable of being or liable to be destroyed
